name: Bored
desc: Has a 10% chance per turn to not do anything while inflicted.

name: Burn
desc: Takes 5% dmg per turn. Also lowers MATK by 15% while inflicted.

name: Bloated
desc: Will heal by 2% per turn, but SP is lowered by 20% and RATK is lowered by 5% while inflicted.

name: Conductive
desc: Opposing damaging attacks attack 25% faster while inflicted.

name: Confused
desc: A 10% chance per turn to attack itself while inflicted.

name: Possessed
desc: A 30% chance once to attack itself with it's own move.

name: Nauseous
desc: Has a 10% chance per turn to use the wrong move and lowers RATK by 10% while inflicted

name: Wounded
desc: Cannot be swapped out. Increases all RATK dmg by 14% while inflicted.

name: Exposed
desc: Opposing attacks are unable to miss while inflicted.

name: Blind
desc: Attacks have a 40% increase in missing while inflicted.
